transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir. 
Customer: Haan ji sir bataye.
Customer: Main bol raha hu jab dashboard khol rahe hai na.
Customer: To ekdam white aa raha hai matlab koi bhi chahe wo fake buylead ho chahe product se related ho kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Matlab white pada hai.
Executive: Maine aapko subah se aapne chhe lead consume to kar liye hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi
Customer: Buylead ka to dashboard to chalta hi hai na.
Executive: Sir agar portal pe aayegi to aapko bilkul dikhegi.
Customer: Aisa thodi na hai humne chalaya barso se IndiaMART ye pehla first time nahi hai ke aise chala rahe hai.
Customer: Kabhi bhi white nahi hua.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Bataye.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Customer: Check kijiye aap dashboard ko check karo pehle to.
Executive: Main check kar le raha hu ek baar maine open hi kar rakha.
Customer: Aap hi ne to bana rakha hai system ke chahe itni buylead mil rahi hai aapko aap chahe ek din me kharch kare chahe ek hafte me kharch kare.
Executive: Haan to ab aap dono taraf dono taraf.
Customer: Nahi nahi dono taraf baatein bol rahe ho jab main aapko complaint likha raha hu ki kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Na koi update hai waha pe aur na koi buylead hai.
Executive: Subah hi aapne mujhe bataya ek buyer call aayi hai paanch buylead maine consume karayi hai aapko.
Customer: Maine shaniwar ko bola tha aapko maine shaniwar ko ye cheez boli thi.
Executive: Subah bola aapne ki do minute pehle ki buyer call aaya tha mujhe subah quotation wagera bhejne.
Customer: Haan wo to suniye us bare me nahi maine is bare me bataya jo abhi bata raha hu na main is bare me aapko shaniwar ko maine note karwaya tha aapko to aapne kaha tha ki kal to sunday hai kal kuch hoga nahi main monday ko theek karke deta hu aapko ye cheez ye issue aa raha hai to.
Customer: Ab aap baat ko change kar rahe hai.
Customer: Yehi problem hai aapke sath me.
Executive: Nahi main aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Abhi dekho abhi dekho dashboard ko abhi dekho open to karo aap.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Open kiya maine usme abhi lead nahi hai koi.
Customer: Matlab bilkul bhi nahi ekdam fir kya matlab hua.
Customer: Ye ye is tarike se package chalega.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Dashboard dashboard bhara rehta hai kam se kam 50 se 100 ke kareeb buylead aa rakhi hoti hai usme fake unfake.
Customer: Theek hai na to ab usme ye to rahe ki haan bhai aa to rahi hai.
Executive: Member ki lead aayi thi 11 minute pehle Samastipur ki aapne nahi consume kari sold out ho gayi.
Customer: Are main to regular baitha hu mere paas me nahi aayegi to fir main kaise karunga.
Executive: Sir aisa hai na.
Customer: Are 11 minute pehle sold out hui hai sir abhi abhi.
Customer: Are to mere bhai main main aapko note kara raha hu kam kam se kam dedh ghante pehle maine complaint dali hai aapko ke aisi aisi baat hai aapne kaha ki lunch chal raha hai maine kaha chalo abhi chhodo ek ghante baad hi baat.
Executive: Portal to aap hi open karke dekhenge na.
Customer: Haan bilkul waha kuch nahi tha bilkul white hai dashboard main note to karwa raha hu mere bhai aur kis hisab se note karaunga aapko aap bol rahe ho aa rakhi hai buylead.
Executive: Abhi abhi sir 11 minute pehle ki lead aayi dekhiye.
Customer: Are to maine open karke rakha hua hai mere bhai open karke rakha hai continue isi pe laga hua hu.
Executive: 2018 ke baad se open nahi hua hai aapka aur aap bol rahe ho open karke rakha hai.
Customer: Bilkul open karke rakha hua hai.
Customer: Maine note karwayi aapko complaint.
Customer: Dekhiye ji dashboard check karo aap open karke dekhte hai kitni buylead aayi hai kitni fake hai.
Customer: Dekhiye maine bola maine kaha buylead pada hai to bhi white pada hai to fir ke kaun si buylead aayegi waha pe.
Customer: To batao aap mujhe.
Executive: Awaaz nahi aa rahi sir aapki.
Customer: Suno suno ek minute 51 minute pehle ki bata raha hai sunna meri baat ko wo 11 minute pehle ki nahi hai ya aapka ya to system sahi nahi hai ya fir aap jhooth bol rahe ho ye dekho isme aayi hui hai.
Customer: Maine aapko screenshot bheja hua hai.
Customer: Meri baat suno meri baat suno.
Customer: Wash basin quantity 50 Mumbai Maharashtra aur material hai red bill sanitary ware ye hamare kisi kaam ki nahi hai 51 minute pehle ki sirf only ek buylead aayi hai ye.
Customer: Abhi dikh raha hoga aapko.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji ji haan ji haan 51 minute pehle ki buylead hai.
Executive: Mumbai Maharashtra se check karo aap iske alawa kuch nahi hai mere paas me ye ek buylead ke alawa ye bhi fake hai kyuki ye mera product nahi hai sanitary ware ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Boliye kis tarike se chalaoge aap account batao mujhe.
Executive: Sir maine abhi aapko lead bheji 11 minute pehle ki lead sold out ho gayi.
Customer: Are wo kaun si kaun si to mere paas kyun nahi aayi.
Executive: Maine whatsapp pe sir aapke paas nahi aayi hogi agar aapne are nahi aayi mere bhai jab 51 minute pehle ki main bata raha hu suno 51 minute pehle ki bata raha hu main aapko.
Customer: Main bhi to kuch bata raha hu na system se are mere paas main main koi mere man se bol dunga mere man se bol dunga jo aapka system hai uske hisab se chalunga na main.
Customer: Aapka system bata raha hai 51 minute pehle ki hai aur wo bhi fake hai iske alawa 51 minute pehle ke alawa kuch nahi aaya mere paas me.
Executive: Sir 11 minute aur aayega suniye aayega suniye product se related aayega to main kya usko chhod dunga main bewakoof hu aap bataiye mujhe.
Executive: Nahi lekin aapne package isliye nahi nahi humne package isliye to liya hai suno humne package isliye to liya hai ki hamare product se related aayegi use consume karenge hum.
Customer: Kyun chhod dunga usko main.
Executive: Aapko usse main yahi bolunga ki aap usme active rahiye lead jo aayegi wo aapko dikhegi.
Customer: Are are hai hi nahi kya active rahunga main white me rahunga.
Executive: Sir dashboard khali pada hai.
Customer: Achha aise usko open karke rakhu main mere samne sheeshe ki tarah.
Executive: Sir 11 minute kuch update to chalna chahiye waha pe kuch update chalega ki nahi chalega ye aise white pada rahega.
Executive: Sir main aapse bol raha hu ek lead aati hai paanch log consume karte hai wo sold out ho jati hai aap agar us pe nahi active rahenge wo lead nahi dikhegi aapko sold out.
Customer: White me white me white me kuch nahi hai waha pe ekdam white dashboard pada hai white dashboard uske alawa kuch nahi hai kuch likha hua to ho abhi main bata raha hu aapko sirf aur sirf ye ek buylead ke alawa kuch nahi hai panel pada hai ekdam white.
Executive: Sir main samajh gaya mujhe bhi wahi dikh raha hai lekin aap active rahenge jaise hi lead aayegi aapko dikhegi nahi active rahenge wo lead aayegi sold out ho jayegi.
Customer: Are to ye kaun sa hua are waha waha kam se kam 20 25 buylead padi rehti hai padi rehti hai ki nahi fake be fake.
Executive: Sir fake lead koi nahi hoti hai sab genuine hi hoti hai.
Customer: Fake fake fake hi zyadatar fake hi fake ka istemal karte hai aap.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai aap bilkul jo hamare product se related nahi to hamare liye fake hi wo to fazool ki hai.
Executive: Theek hai main ek baar rukiye abhi check karke aapko call meri meri baat suno dashboard white nahi rehna chahiye ye aapke system me hai hi nahi ya to aapne kar ke rakha hua hai khud se.
Executive: Ye aapke system me nahi hai humne barso se chalaya hai aisa kabhi nahi kuch hua hai kahi na kahi mistake hai ya to aapko technology kahi problem hai to aapke wo jo employee honge jo technical issue ko dekhte hai jo technology me problem aa rahi hai to usko unko boliye na aap.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap to bas apna palla jhadne ki koshish karte hai ki bas hamara payment aa gaya ab agli company jaane aur agla aage jaane.
Executive: Designer pedestal sink ki lead aayi hai abhi abhi dekhiye to stone nahi hai na isme isme stone designer pedestal stone designer me kitne kitne product honge aap dekho.
Customer: Aap dekhiye to lead aayi hai kaam ki hai aapki to nahi hai aap humse hi baat karenge to kaise dekhenge sir ek minute.
Executive: Ye aayi hai designer pedestal sink Mumbai Maharashtra.
Executive: To isme stone hai na hi koi steel ceramic ya marble ya patthar kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Aap bol rahe the ki white dashboard karke rakha hai jaise hi ye lead aayi to aapko dikhi ki nahi dikhi abhi paanch minute aap nahi dekhenge ye sold out.
Customer: Meri baat suno bhara hua suniye meri baat ko aap nahi samajh rahe aapke system me ye dashboard jo hai bhara hua rehta hai white nahi rehta hai khali nahi rehta.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Aisa hi hai first first time nahi chala raha hu main ye naya banda nahi hu main.
Executive: Theek hai abhi mere senior Ranjeet sir aayenge main ek baar aapse unse baat karunga haan ji abhi Ranjeet sir aa rahe honge mere senior to main unse aapse ki baat karunga.
Customer: Bas ye chalta rahega main unse baat karunga isse baat karunga bas aap time jo hai samay barbad karte rehte ho hamara iske alawa aur kuch nirnay dena nahi hai.
Customer: Kamal karte ho aap log.
Customer: Aise aate aate har ek baithe rahe aur
summary:
Concerns:

- Dashboard is completely white, no buyleads visible.

- Believes the system is faulty or executive is lying.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads received.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the dashboard, confirmed no leads.

- Executive stated customer has consumed leads today.

- Executive mentioned a lead 11 minutes ago.

- Executive said senior will call the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Senior executive Ranjeet will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- dashboard, buyleads, technical issue, fake leads, system
